lines.text: Why is there a watermelon there?
I'll tell you later.
Hey, hey, hey, hey-now. Don't be mean; we don't have to be mean, cuz, remember, no matter where you go, there you are.
History is-a made at night. Character is what you are in the dark.
Sealed with a curse as sharp as a knife. Doomed is your soul and damned is your life.
Pictures don't lie.
The hell they don't. I met my first wife that way.
Buckaroo, The White House wants to know is everything ok with the alien space craft from Planet 10 or should we just go ahead and destroy Russia?
Tell him yes on one and no on two.
Which one was yes, go ahead and destroy Russia... or number 2?
May I pass along my congratulations for your great interdimensional breakthrough. I am sure, in the miserable annals of the Earth, you will be duly enshrined.
Where are we going?
Planet Ten!
When?
Real soon!
They're only monkey-boys. We can crush them here on earth, Lord Whorfin.
[after Buckaroo has been ionized]
There they are.
There who are?
Don't you see them?
See who?
[Buckaroo points at the Lectroids]
There! Evil PURE AND SIMPLE by way of the Eighth Dimension!
It's not my goddamn planet. Understand, monkey boy?
Dr. Banzai is using a laser to vaporize a pineal tumor without damaging the parthogenital plate. A subcutaneous microphone will allow the patient to transmit verbal instructions to his own brain.
Like, "raise my left arm"?
Or "throw the harpoon." People are gonna come from all over. This boy's an Eskimo.
Who are you today, Doc? Einstein?
Lord John Worfin. If there's one thing I hate, it's to be mistaken for somebody else.
Lithium is no longer available on credit.

You can check your anatomy all you want, and even though there may be normal variation, when it comes right down to it, this far inside the head it all looks the same. No, no, no, don't tug on that. You never know what it might be attached to.
Emilio Lizardo. Wasn't he on TV once?
You're thinking of Mr. Wizard.
Emilio Lizardo is a top scientist, dummkopf.
So was Mr. Wizard.
[Buckaroo finishes talking with Penny in jail]
Let her out.
Hey, me too.
Let her out?
That's right, let her out. I'll be responsible.
But she's a killer.
No, she's not. Now, let her out and give her your coat.
Why me?
Because you're perfect.
You have a point there.
Laugh-a while you can, monkey-boy.
Take her to the Pitt. Go, Big-booty. Use more honey. Find out what she knows.
I've been ionized, but I'm okay now.
The man's been through solid matter, for crying out loud. Who knows what's happened to his brain? Maybe it's scrambled his molecules. All I'm saying is, Mr. President, let's not panic.
I'll try to be quick. In case you haven't noticed, we have a motorcycle convention moving in and let's face it, you didn't come here to listen to me talk.
You're right.
Shut up, Big-booty, you coward. You are the weakest individual I ever know.

[reading]
"Declaration of War... the short form."
You ever thought about joining me full time?
Whatya mean, you serious, do you have an opening?
Uh huh. Can you sing?
A little, yeh, I can dance.
You remind me of someone I once knew.
Was she... very beautiful?
She was... Queen of the Netherlands
Damn John Whorfin and the horse he rode in on.
John Valuk is dead, he fell on his head. But perhaps John Parker will get through with our message to Buckaroo Banzai.
Buckaroo, I don't know what to say. Lectroids? Planet 10? Nuclear extortion? A girl named "John"?
[repeated line]
BigbooTAY!
Be cool. She'll hold.
Home... home is where you wear your hat... I feel so breakup, I wanna go home.
It flies like a truck.
Good, what is a truck?

[as the pod-ship is in a free-fall]
I'm a diplomat! I failed flight school!
If you fail, we will be forced to help you destroy yourselves.

[said to Buckaroo]
Don't embarrass us.
President's calling, Buckaroo.
The president of what?
The President of The United States.
Oh.
Uh, Dr. Banzai, you... you forgot your thruster.

[smiles]
Why don't you hold onto it for a while?

[looks at him suggestively as he leaves the room]
Anytime...
So what? Big deal!
You are... John YaYa. And you... John Smallberries.
Let's go back up to my office and talk about this like two reasonable beings.
[intro to a flashback]
Nineteen thirty-eight. Can you imagine what it must have been like then... then... then...
Dad. Dad. Buckaroo's in trouble.
Say what?
I don't care if you drove through a mountain in Texas. This is New Jersey, and when you play my... when you play my joint, you're just another act. I want some music out'a you characters!
You want it, Artie? You got it.
Gimme some light will ya?
I got two guns in my hands.
Put one of them down.
I ain't puttin' the guns down!
Is anybody out there not having a good time?
[Pinky Caruthers raises his hand]
Put the snot on the track, John O'Connor.
Lest we let this place become a zoo, not to mention a haven for gawkers.
I don't give a flying handshake what your name is.
Barney, I'm going home... with my overthruster.

[shouting into a radio microphone]
BANZAI! I'LL-A SEE YOU IN-A HELL!
She can't be serious, can she? Vaporize the whole damn planet?
You wanna roll all those dice, Casper?
Oh, no, no, no, no, no, no. Not me, man, not me.
The only joy is the joy of duty. Work... work... work.

[pointing an assault rifle at McKinley]
Get away from that car or I'll drink your blood!

[nervously]
What'cha got there, son? That's not... real, is it?
[Scooter turns, fires a shot in the air, and turns back to McKinley]
Get 'em up!
We've had our chance! Your Overthruster's for shit! We're lost!
One more word out of you, Bigbooty...

[screaming]
BIG-BOO-TAY! TAY! TAY!
[Whorfin shoots him]
I've come for your tv. You've been using too much juice. Another 10,000 kilowatts again this month. Beats me how an old, homicidal loony can use that much power.
John O'Connor, break the window!
Why me, John Bigboote?
It might be booby-trapped!
Oh.
John O'Connor, install my Oscillation Overthruster!
Will somebody turn off that gosh darn klaxon?
Prepare to annihilate Smolensk!
You're like Jerry Lewis, you give me hope to carry on, then you leave me in the lurch while you strap on your six-guns...
[after crashing through the wall of a factory]
We are not in the Eighth dimension, we are over New Jersey. Hope is not lost.
